TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供對 類別所使用之要求和回應物件的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the request and response objects used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供用戶端的超文字傳輸通訊協定 (HTTP) 的要求正在處理的相關資訊物件。This class provides the information related to a client's Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) request being processed by an object. 這個類別也有方法可讓接受 WebSocket 連線物件。This class also has methods that allow an object to accept a WebSocket connection. 方法傳回的執行個體類別。The method returns instances of the class. 若要取得的物件，代表用戶端要求，請使用屬性。To get the object that represents the client request, use the property. 若要取得物件，表示將傳送到用戶端的回應，使用屬性。To get the object that represents the response that will be sent to the client by the , use the property. 若要取得用戶端傳送要求，例如其登入名稱與是否它有已通過驗證的使用者資訊，您可以查詢中的屬性所傳回物件屬性。To get user information about the client sending the request, such as its login name and whether it has been authenticated, you can query the properties in the object returned by the property. 關閉傳送回應至用戶端物件，並釋放所使用的任何資源。Closing an object sends the response to the client and frees any resources used by the . 正在中止物件會捨棄用戶端的回應，如果它已經尚未傳送，並釋出所使用的任何資源。Aborting an object discards the response to the client if it has not already been sent, and frees any resources used by the . 之後關閉或中止物件，您無法參考其方法或屬性。After closing or aborting an object, you cannot reference its methods or properties. 如果您這樣做，您會收到例外狀況。If you do so, you will receive an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示用戶端要求的使用者資訊。The following code example displays the user information for a client request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)]

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式接受 WebSocket 連接。

span.span: Accept a WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.WebSockets.HttpListenerWebSocketContext> AcceptWebSocketAsync (string subProtocol);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.WebSockets.HttpListenerWebSocketContext> AcceptWebSocketAsync(string subProtocol) cil managed
Public Function AcceptWebSocketAsync (subProtocol As String) As Task(Of HttpListenerWebSocketContext)
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::Net::WebSockets::HttpListenerWebSocketContext ^> ^ AcceptWebSocketAsync(System::String ^ subProtocol);

param.name: subProtocol
param.span: 支援的 WebSocket 子通訊協定。

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式接受 WebSocket 連接。

span.span: Accept a WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回 物件。

span.span: The property on the task object returns an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回已接受 WebSocket 連線之後，物件會完成。The returned object will complete after the WebSocket connection has been accepted. 接收緩衝區的大小為 16,385 位元組。The size of the receive buffer is 16,385 bytes. WebSocket 保持連接間隔設定為 30000 （30 秒） 的預設值。The WebSocket keep-alive interval is set to the default value of 30,000 (30 seconds).

exception.span: 傳送回應以完成 WebSocket 信號交換時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when sending the response to complete the WebSocket handshake.

summary.span: 取得 ，表示用戶端的資源要求。

span.span: Gets the that represents a client's request for a resource.
An object that represents the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您關閉這，它會傳送回應至用戶端，關閉包含回應，並關閉這個屬性所傳回的物件。If you close this , it will send the response to the client, close the that contains the response, and close the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. `listener`變數會保存物件。The `listener` variable holds an object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)]

Public ReadOnly Property Response As HttpListenerResponse
public: property System::Net::HttpListenerResponse ^ Response { System::Net::HttpListenerResponse ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得將傳送至用戶端的 物件，以回應用戶端的要求。

span.span: Gets the object that will be sent to the client in response to the client's request.

value.span: 物件，用來將回應送回用戶端。

span.span: An object used to send a response back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式設定中設定屬性的回應這個屬性所傳回的物件。Your application configures the response by setting properties in the object returned by this property. 設定回應之後, 您傳送給用戶端透過關閉回應，或是關閉這物件。After configuring the response, you send it to the client by closing the response, or by closing this object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得用戶端要求的回應並加入回應主體。The following code example demonstrates getting the response to a client's request and adding the response body. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)]

para.span: 注意： 這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時。

span.span: Note: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 取得用來取得用戶端識別、驗證資訊和安全性角色之物件，由這個 物件表示用戶端的要求。

span.span: Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the client whose request is represented by this object.

value.span: 描述用戶端的 物件，如果提供這個 的 不需要驗證，則為 。

span.span: An object that describes the client, or if the that supplied this does not require authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指出它需要驗證使用屬性或藉由指定委派使用屬性。An indicates that it requires authentication using the property or by specifying an delegate using the property. 若要判斷用戶端的登入名稱和驗證資訊，請檢查這個屬性所傳回的物件中的屬性。To determine the client's login name and authentication information, check the property in the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取有關用戶端，並將其傳回的回應中的用戶端身分識別和驗證資訊。The following code example demonstrates accessing identity and authentication information about the client, and returning it to the client in the response. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)]
